reviews.review: Masterpiece

Journey to a remote, hostile planet with a group of marooned passengers who learn that escaped convict Riddick isn't the only thing they have to fear in Half-Life 2. Then, see him battle ruthless soldiers of fortune and vicious creatures in renowned animator Peter Chung's Half-Life 2: Episode 1.  And finally, Riddick finds himself humanity's unlikely champion in the special effects-fueled Half-Life 2: Episode 2. Join Riddick in three times the action, three times the adrenaline, and three times the adventure as the Half-Life Trilogy makes complete one of the greatest sci-fi epics of all time!
If you don't have it, you better have lived under a rock.
Greatest game of all time, IMO.
Great game, ignore this you know already
Сама игра просто шедевр! А сколько достойных, бесплатных модификаций на её основе можно запустить! А сколько можно сделать самому! Используя прилагающийся инструментарий SDK!
Totally a must buy. You have a crowbar and you're not afraid of anything.

This really is probably the greatest FPS out there. A deep compelling story is fleshed out nicely throughout the game in the dialogue of all the NPC's. The levels are so well paced and come with a great mix of puzzles, exploration and action.
Seems like there are plenty of great mods too that only deepen the immersion of the game's universe.
Best Game Ever!
if ur a fan of the half life series url lov this

Best game ever. I don't need to say anything else, do I?
Fantasticoooooooooo....il miglior sparatutto ceh ci sia|
I may be biased (being an MIT physics graduate like Gordon), but this is the best game in the history of computer gaming.

Half-Life 2 is an Amazing FPS Game with a grand story and heart renching at times....
Takes place In the near future... 
The world is over run with alien life and only one lone man came save it all..... ^_^

Gordan Freeman :: "The ONE FREEMAN"  ^_^

Its a must play for anyone that loves a good FPS game and its story..! ^_^
This is a must play if You like FPS' or PC games.

Half-Life 2 is, without contender, my favorite game I've ever played.  The gameplay is simplistic, yet varied, with an epic and intricate storyline that always leaves me feeling like a badass. Multidimensional characters, beautiful graphics, careful map design, great music, impeccable voice acting, clean sound design, and realistic physics complete the experience.  This is the game that proved to me that games could be good.

Lead on, Freeman.

E' stato più volte acclamato dalla critica come Miglior Gioco dell'Anno, e reputato uno dei migliori sparatutto in prima persona di sempre. Sostenuto dal motore grafico Source, vanta una grafica moderna e una fisica realistica, oltre ad una trama ricca d'azione.
Non c'è motivo per cui non ci giochiate.
----------------------------------------------------------
It has often been acclaimed by critics as Best Game of the Year, and considered as one of the best first person shooter ever. Powered by the Source graphics engine, it boasts a modern graphics and a realistic physics, plus a plot full of action.
There are no excuses for not playing it.
Best Valve game ever!
A man turns a crowbar from a simple working tool into a symbol of freedom in the face of oppression. Nice physics and a nice story to accompany the warlike adventures of Dr. Freeman.
The best FPS ever, period.
Seriously I think this is the best single-player FPS I have ever played. Engrossing storyline and excellent physics engine. Just Get It!
If you have not played through Half Life games yet, you should not own a computer.
One of the best games I've played in a long time, Compelling and not just your average FPS!

An adventure (and physics engine) you'll never forget. If you haven't played this game, where have you been in the past 6 years? Get The Orange Box, it's totally worth it and a lot cheaper than getting this game by itself. Also, make sure to get Episode 1 and 2 (included in The Orange Box) so you can be current with the story.
Episode 3
There is no better.
One bad-ass epic story with a hardcore scientist bent on heroism!  If you STILL haven't played this game yet - it's not too late.  Everyone on steam should play this atleast once.  Nuff Said.
Everyone should play this game at least once.

Greatest PC game of all time, all that needs to be said

No other FPS game comes close to Half Life 2.
Valve really out did them selfs, I can't wait for more Half Life games.

Half-Life 2. Played it before, actually, twice, once on easy and once on hard. Both times equally fun! Now that I'm playing it for the third time, I like how the game gives you the sense of helplesness at the start, from being weaponless, fighting to get a pistol, getting twarted by even stronger enemies everytime when all seems ok, and then it really dawns on you. The railroad line? If you want to survive, you have to RUN. Scripted events hardly feel forced on you, NPC emotions looks realistic, and you? You are going to be once again, the hero that everyone had not expected.

Easily the best first person shooter of the 2000's, Half Life 2 defined the genre the same way the original Half Life did. The combat is top notch, the story involving, the atmosphere unparalleled. It still holds up a decade later.
アリっ糞を射殺できるなら神ゲー
no comment needed, GREAT GRAPHICS GREAT GAMEPLAY ;DD

総合的には名作。6年前のグラフィックエンジンとは思えない見事な作り込みで、また敵味方を問わずAIは非常に優秀、多様なステージ、申し訳程度の謎解き要素、必要性がよく分からないストーリー、12時間以上の十分なボリューム。総合的には非常に満足のいく作品であった。ただ少々大味な感はあるのと、「FPSは撃ちあいがメインでそれ以外はおまけ」と考えるプレイヤーには少々不満が残ると思う。基本的に撃ちあいはそれほど発生しないし、どちらにしてもメイン要素ではない。またせっかくの物理エンジンでリアリティを出したはいいが、「暗黒エネルギー」辺りではストーリーが完全にSF化してしまっているため、今ひとつ臨場感を欠いていたというのも否めない。
Gordon Freeman.  Nuff said.

A cult classic FPS, considered one of the greatest games of all time by the few who know about this hidden Steam treasure.

One of the best games of all time, following the classic Half-Life. When it first came out the graphics were next gen, it set the bar for many first person shooters. It changed the way we thought and played. The story is so compelling, it draws you in. The puzzles in the game really make you stop and think, forcing you to take different courses of action. It certainly gives you an adrenaline rush, from the beginning to the very end. This game is a MUST HAVE for all gamers.

Сказать что эта игра Икона игровой индустрии, значит ничего не сказать. Это игра с большой буквы И. Сколько времени прошло а она буквально затягивает в себя с первых минут геймплея. По праву её можно назвать Лучшей игрой всех времен и народов. Рекомендую!

Well, it's not like this game needs MY recommendation, but for what it's worth this game is an absolute blast. It has an engaging storyline and addictive gameplay with a perfect balance of puzzle-solving and combat.
...can't wait for the third installment.
Golden rule: If you've got steam, then you should have Half-Life 2. It's that simple!

What Can I say really that hasnt already been said. MEGAULTRASUPERTACLUAR AWESOME. Will that do? 

If you thought the First game was great this a sequel worth the wait. The game does not disapoint as it pulls you through an amazing story. Ive played this all the way through about 6 times now and I never get bored. 

Do not try for the achievements, they seriously detract from the game and its great story. Just Play it.

Uno de los mejores shooters-aventura de todos los tiempos

スコア：85 / ジャンル：FPS / 難易度：中 / パズル：有

FPSというジャンルに多大な影響を与えたHalf-Lifeの続編。前作の発売から凡そ6年あまり経った2004年の発売だったこともあって、グラフィックスには多くの新技術が投入され写実的になった。物理演算を巧みに取り入れたパズルなども、特に目を惹く部分である。ストーリーや展開がより映画のようになり、ロケーションも増えていて飽きさせない。しかし、一方で簡単になってしまったことや、敵の種類が前作と比べて少なくなったのが残念だ。そして主に登場する敵のAIが前作の敵海兵隊員よりも悪いことである。連携することも無く、ただ棒立のまま戦い続ける姿には唖然とした。残念な部分もあるが、全体としては高いレベルに達していることも確かなので、お勧めしておきます。
Для меня это больше чем лучшая игра.

This game is amazing from beginning to end. If you're looking for an immersive single player, sci-fi campaign in a game with tons of variety, you have to buy this game. Consider yourself lucky that you can purchase this game at a price of 10.00. This is one of those games that should never cost anything less than 30.00. If there is one thing that Valve knows how to do, it's making first person games that are fondly remembered years after they're released. If you don't believe me, check Metacritic for the averaged scores of Half Life 1 and Half Life 2. BUY THIS GAME!!!

Look, I'm not going to lie to you - I dipped in and out of this game for about two years. I didn't finish it until late '09. And there are two follow-ups! Two! I've barely even scratched the surface of the first one!

Nevertheless, I love it. If you don't own this by now, I suppose you're probably not on Steam. Or whatever. So how can you read this?
You.... what?  You are looking at a recommendation for this?  Why.... why do you not own this?  Have you seriously gone 6 years without playing this game?  Get it.  Now.

The ultimate in ingame storytelling and gameplay.

Play it, lick it, make love to it. One of the best games EVAR
